|brand = Gateworks |model = Avila |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = GW2345E |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 11/02/2010 |page_start_origon = https://infodepot.fandom.com/wiki/Gateworks_Avila_GW2345 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel XScale;IXP425;GWIXP425BDT; |cpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 533 <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Intel;TE28F128J3D75; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Micron;MT48LC16M16A2; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Kendin;KS8995MA; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCI, CompactFlash, MicroUSB, |exp_minipci_num = 4 |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = <!-- Type of POE --> |pwr_poe = 6-28 |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 10-pin header,, (115200 8N1), |jtag = yes,, 14-pin header,,
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery backup, hardware watchdog, temp. and volt. sensor |addchip = Temperature Sensor and Single Channel ADC;Analog Devices;AD7418;;1;,,, Serial EEPROM (8 Kbit);Atmel;AT24C08AN;;1;,,, Low Voltage Serial Timekeeping Chip;Dallas Semiconductor;DS1672;;1;,,, 3V RS232 Transceiver;Intersil;ICL32231IV;;1;,,, Dual 30V N-Channel SyncFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDS6982S;;2;,,, Dual, 550kHz, 2-Phase Synchronous Regulator; Linear Technology;LTC3728L;;1;,,, 33.33 Mhz SMD Crystal Oscillator;Suntsu Frequency Control;SOCB48-33.333;;1;,,, 25 Mhz SMD Crystal Oscillator;Suntsu Frequency Control;SOCB48-25.000;;1;,,, 1.5A Low Dropout Positive Regulator;Texas Instruments;LM1086;;1;,,, Low drop positive voltage regulator;STMicroelectronics;LD1117;;1;,,, 3.3V high-speed non-inverting clock buffer;Pericom Semiconductor;PI49FCT3803;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
